If these brethren leave here, as I believe it is their duty to do, then I beg of you, for Christ's sake, not to follow them with criticism wherever they go. And whoever comes in here to take their places, lift them up and help them. There is a great work to be done here and in the South. These brethren feel that they can 


                               -357- 

glorify God better by going South, I have not persuaded them. Their heart is there, Now, let them go, and do not blame them for going.
